messages.messageBody:
On Jun 18, 2006, at 5:41 PM, Krisula Moyer wrote:

> My kids want to do a Hogwarts theme at home this week (maybe longer).
> There are about a thousand fan sites. Do you or your kids have a
> recommendation for their favorite sites where we can get ideas for
> things to
> do Hogwarts style?
>
> Thanks in advance,
> Krisula
>

mugglenet.com

hp-lexicon.org

jkrowling.com

the-leaky-cauldron.org

Nancy (and Laura)

messages.subject: RE: [AlwaysLearning] Hogwarts
messages.msgSnippet: There’s a very cool yahoo group at HYPERLINK http://groups.yahoo.com/group/HogwartsSCS/ http://groups.yahoo.com/group/Ho gwartsSCS/ with lots of ideas for a
messages.messageBody:
There�s a very cool yahoo group at HYPERLINK
"http://groups.yahoo.com/group/HogwartsSCS/"http://groups.yahoo.com/group/Ho
gwartsSCS/ with lots of ideas for a pretend Hogwarts Summer Correspondence
School. There�s lots of fun stuff there, and some not so cool too, but of
course you can take what you like and leave the rest :-)



~Q~

aka Sarah

HYPERLINK "http://www.unbridledlearning.com"http://www.unbridledlearning.com

_____

From: AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com [mailto:AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com]
On Behalf Of Krisula Moyer
Sent: Sunday, June 18, 2006 5:42 PM
To: AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [AlwaysLearning] Hogwarts



My kids want to do a Hogwarts theme at home this week (maybe longer).
There are about a thousand fan sites. Do you or your kids have a
recommendation for their favorite sites where we can get ideas for things to
do Hogwarts style?

Thanks in advance,
Krisula

My kids want to do a Hogwarts theme at home this week (maybe longer).
There are about a thousand fan sites. Do you or your kids have a
